snippet: POMFRET--Margaret, 88, died March 22, at home. She was a professional artist and taught in New York City public high schools. She moved to Seattle in 1990. Survivors are husband, John D.; daughter, Dana Pomfret; son, John E.; daughter-in-law, Mei Zhang; three grandchildren, Dali, Liya and Sophie Pomfret, and brother, Thomas Haas. 1/3
lead_paragraph: POMFRET--Margaret, 88, died March 22, at home. She was a professional artist and taught in New York City public high schools. She moved to Seattle in 1990. Survivors are husband, John D.; daughter, Dana Pomfret; son, John E.; daughter-in-law, Mei Zhang; three grandchildren, Dali, Liya and Sophie Pomfret, and brother, Thomas Haas. 1/3
